descriptionHtml:
This mod is my first big mod so sorry for that one dialog bug just reload your last save/auto save:
also on steam workshop========== http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=131484903

Requirements:
Latest Skyrim Update

Recommended:
FAMP2========== http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26271
Dawnguard=DLC 1
Dragonborn=DLC 3
Have maven black-briar jarl of riften======= sorry spoiler but its kinda obvious lol
Keep the dark brotherhood alive
Comlete goldenglow estate==== you dont have to but it makes sense

BUGS:
Just one so far======Please report if anymore
if the dialog option doesn\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'t appear just reload your last save (Recommended== your last auto save)

LORE:             MIGHT CONTAIN SPOILERS!!!!

After the empire took control of riften maven black-briar became jarl. thus her meadery was falling behind so she needs someone famous to run it so what if the dragonborn could run it but the dragonborn would first need to prove his/her loyalty to maven so instead of contacting the dark brotherhood or the thieves guild she wants the dragonborn to kill her meadery boss Indayn (and take his mark of dibella for a future quest) so if you got what it takes to run Black-Briar Meadery Then download this mod!

NOTE:
Even if you dont like the meadery game then you can choose 2 options either run the meadery or get payed 50000 gold with 50 of each of black-briar mead.

CRAFTING:
i\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'v replaced the brewing brewers in the meadery with craftting vats so you can brew Black-Briar mead and special reserve maven will give you the recipes with the key.

HINT:
if you go in the meadery bed and it says \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"owned\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" just activate it anyway ;)
as you can see the player is now in riftenblackbriarmeadery faction!

CLASHES:
basic text/dialog enhancing mods will clash
dont mess with mavens voice (if her lips dont move thats because i\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'m a guy and im not voice acting maven)
Any mods that has to do with the black briar meadery

CHANGE-LOG:
3/8/2013  v1.00 ======= release (please report any bugs to me)
3/12/2013  v1.1 ======= Fixed the dialog

CREDITS:
magicpanda ======= for inspiring me to create this ======= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11048
neonartemis ======= for beta testing this 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2188402
Bethesda Softworks ======= for making this whole game with out them skyrim would never exist lol
Cobra298 ======== for creating this mod (me)
COB ======== for giving me the reference id to help me sort (again me)
lastly but not least-lee THE CREATION KIT =========== for giving me the tools to create this

Thanks and have fun!!!                                             Cobra298
author: Cobra298
